result.eng: The sun is shining and I am happy.
result.ga: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamh agus tá mise sásta
result.orig: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamh agus tá mise sásta
result.html: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamh agus tá mise sástaThe sun is shining and I am happy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ġrian ag taitneaṁ agus tá mise sástaThe sun is shining and I am happy.

result.html: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamhThe sun is shining.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ġrian ag taitneaṁThe sun is shining.

result.eng: I have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ga: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh
result.orig: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh
result.html: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamhI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ponchtml: Tá orm hata a ċaiṫeaṁ toisc go ḃfuil an ġrian ag taitneaṁI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.

result.eng: Bright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ga: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ponchtml: Solais loinnireaċa ġeala a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.
